modalTitle: How this app works on your device
modalText: This section shows if this app works on your device.
installRequired: Install the app to rate it or write a review
security: Here is additional information provided by the developer about the data this app may collect and share, as well as the security practices it follows. Data policies may vary depending on the app version, usage, region, and age.
shareData: No data shared with third parties
shareText: The developer states that this app does not share user data with other companies or organizations.
dataEncryptionSText: Your data is transmitted through a secure connection
dataStoringText: The developer provides a way to request the deletion of your data
dataSafetyText: Here is additional information provided by the developer about the data this app may collect and share, as well as the security practices it follows. Data policies may vary depending on the app version, usage, region, and age.
ratesAndReviewsAreVerified: Ratings and reviews are verified. They were left by users with the same device as yours.
safetyContent: To ensure safety, it's important to understand how developers collect your data and share it with third parties. Security and privacy policies may vary depending on your app usage, region, and age. The information below is provided by the developer and may change in the future.
thirdParty: This app may share the specified data with third parties.
locationDisclosure: Location, App Information and Performance, Device Identifiers, or other data
